event.title: 1 January 2010 the municipalities of Portein, Präz, Sarn and Tartar merged

data.event: On 1 January 2010 the municipalities of Portein, Präz, Sarn and Tartar merged into the municipality of Cazis.
The municipalities of Portein, Präz, Sarn, and Tartar merged on 1 January 2010 into the municipality of Cazis.
